text:
<@U071HK21YQP> - you can likely add an event listener using HubSpot forms global events - likely using the `onFormSubmitted` event to then fire your code to close the modal and set the cookie. 

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/global-form-events|https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/global-form-events>
